#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    unsigned long long int t,d,r,p,num;
    scanf("%llu %llu",&t,&d);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%llu %llu",&num,&p);
        r=num%d;
        if(r==0 || r==1)
        {
            cout<<r<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            r=pow(r,p);
            r=r%d;
            printf("%llu\n",r);
        }

    }
    return 0;
}
